titleStmt.title: A true copie of Colonel Sr. Gamaliel Dudley's letter to His Highnesse Prince Rupert from Newark 4. March. 1644 being an exact relation of Sr. Marm. Langdale's march northward, as also the great victory obtained by him over Lord Fairfax neare Pontefract 1. Martii, 1644.
titleStmt.author: Dudley, Gamaliel.
Rupert, Prince, Count Palatine, 1619-1682.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
